original_text: She covered Jacob's hands with the skin from the goats. She also covered the part of his neck that had no hair.
korean_text: 또 염소 새끼의 가죽을 그의 손과 목의 매끈매끈한 곳에 입히고

sentences.original_text: with the skin from the goats
She also covered the part of his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 또한 그의 목 부분을 덮었습니다
